value.name: Tigers' Victor Reyes: Back in lineup Sunday
value.description: Reyes (pectoral) is back in the starting lineup for Sunday's game against the Yankees. Reyes was scratched from Friday's lineup, though he did appear in the game as a pinch hitter. After sitting all of Saturday's game,

value.name: Tigers' Victor Reyes: Scratched with pectoral stiffness
value.description: Reyes was scratched from the lineup for Friday's game against the Yankees due to pectoral stiffness, Evan Woodbery of MLive.com reports. It doesn't sound as though Reyes is seriously hurt, as he reportedly lobbied to play.

value.name: Detroit Tigers' Victor Reyes ready in return from Toledo; Wilson Ramos to injured list
value.description: Detroit Tigers manager AJ Hinch explains the team's decision to call up Victor Reyes from Triple-A Toledo and send JaCoby Jones to the minors.

value.name: Victor Reyes out of Tigers' lineup Tuesday
value.description: Detroit Tigers outfielder Victor Reyes is not in the lineup for Tuesday's game against right-hander Aaron Civale and the Cleveland Indians.

value.name: JaCoby Jones optioned to Triple-A Toledo, Victor Reyes recalled
value.description: After Sunday’s loss to the Kansas City Royals, the Detroit Tigers optioned JaCoby Jones to Triple-A Toledo. Returning in his place is Victor Reyes, who was sent down two weeks ago when Nomar Mazara returned from the injured list.

value.name: Detroit Tigers send JaCoby Jones to Triple-A Toledo, recall Victor Reyes
value.description: Detroit Tigers outfielder Victor Reyes will get another stint in the majors after an 11-game hitting streak in Triple-A this month.

video.name: Detroit Tigers' Casey Mize breaks down his strong start in 3-2 loss to Royals

value.name: Victor Reyes a late scratch for Tigers; Jose Urena may miss next start
value.description: Reyes reported a "bit of stiffness" before Friday's game, while Urena came out of his last start when his lower right forearm started to cramp.

value.name: Victor Reyes has returned, Harold is hitting: Can the BABIP Bros get back together?
value.description: Don’t be surprised if Harold Castro sprinkles a bit of his magic BABIP dust on Victor Reyes’ bat before tonight’s game. Reyes, who was recalled from Triple-A Toledo when JaCoby Jones was demoted after Sunday’s game,

mentions.name: Batting average on balls in play

value.name: Why Detroit Tigers are 'paying close attention' to Victor Reyes in Triple-A Toledo
value.description: When the Detroit Tigers demoted outfielder Victor Reyes to Triple-A Toledo, manager AJ Hinch asked him to make improvements. So far, so good.

video.name: What Detroit Tigers' Harold Castro thinks about his offensive approach

value.name: Tigers' Victor Reyes looks to keep producing in return from Toledo
value.description: Outfielder Victor Reyes was recalled late Sunday and is back with the Tigers after a 12-game stint with Triple-A Toledo. He started in center field and hit eighth as the team opened a seven-game homestand with a four-game series against the Cleveland Indians on Monday.

value.name: Bieber allows 1 hit in 7 innings, Indians top Tigers 5-2
